name: Jumpscare Castle
description:
The goal is reach the opened door in the labyrinth.

This game is early acces, there are some bugs!

If you can't reach the opened door (because of a bug or just you didn't find it) you can use the retry button in the menu.

The game saves only in the saverooms. After the 10th room there is about 50% chance to spawn a ghost.

Used assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-32351

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/hq-old-books-96841

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/blacksmith-s-forge-17785
